products.title: Foliage Summer Roman Blind
products.description: Their foliage collection brings the outside in, with a charming design consisting of leaves of all shapes and sizes. This fabric would look fabulous in any setting, modern or classic country-style. products.title: Allium, Summer - Roman Blind
products.description: Beautifully natural, the allium in summer melds a creamy white background with delicate florals and foliage imagery in greens, teals, and pinky reds. The result is one of peace and serenity and will work well as part of almost any dcor scheme. Group the summer with alike green and blue tones in a dining room for a relaxed and natural look. Opt for pale eau de nil walls and light wooden floors, with rugs, placemats, and accessories in accenting hues of blue and pink.

products.title: Foliage, Summer - Roman Blind
products.description: The zesty tones of the foliage in summer are summery indeed, and give a refreshing and lively look and feel to this roman blind. The foliage patterning allows you to bring the outside in, so nature lovers are sure to find it appealing. Liven up a guest bedroom by setting the summer against an apple green wall, adding light wooden furniture, and accenting throughout the room with blues and yellows.

products.title: Funchal, Summer - Roman Blind
products.description: The funchal summer is a quality woven fabric, adorned with a truly eye-catching design. The wide range of greens used to define the plant-life contrast beautifully with the subtle off-white canvas-like background. The way in which the leaves appear to have been applied like watercolours on a canvas give the funchal a unique and fashionable look. A great way of injecting a sense of summer and the outdoors into your home, the summer will work perfectly in the master bedroom.

products.title: Phoebe, Summer - Roman Blind
products.description: The phoebe in summer is a quirky rainbow of colour, offering an abstract foliage print in pastel shades of lilac, aqua, pink, and green, accented by deeper hues of black, blue, and grey. The overall look is one of funky character and certainly one for colour lovers. Hang the summer in a studio or creative area, where the variety of colours will leave you inspired. Don't be afraid of adding more colour throughout the rest of the room either, opting for paler shades found in the blind, such as pale aqua.

products.title: Kiribati Summer Roman Blind
products.description: Bring a pop of colour to your home interior with this voyage maison design. Their kiribati summer roman blind is simply divine with the joyful colour palette of pinks, purples and blues and its striking watercolour style. The dot design adds a playful charm to this smart and t bring a pop of colour to your home interior with this voyage maison design.

products.title: Ilinizas Summer Roman Blind
products.description: Showcasing a joyful flower meadow, hand-painted in a myriad of blending watercolours, the ilinizas summer roman blind reminds us of a lovely summers day. It features a stunning collection of brightly coloured flowers, with pops of vibrant pink, teal and yellow. The floral be showcasing a joyful flower meadow, hand-painted in a myriad of blending watercolours, the ilinizas summer roman blind reminds us of a lovely summers day.
